subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Despite a virus that made him sick to his stomach, quarterback Chad Pennington completed 9 of 15 passes, with no turnovers, in the second half of the Jets’ 13-10 victory over Miami.
snippet: Despite a virus that made him sick to his stomach, quarterback Chad Pennington completed 9 of 15 passes, with no turnovers, in the second half of the Jets’ 13-10 victory over Miami.
